events.title: Infinite Empire Established
events.dialog: Kwa come from Dathomir and arrive on Lehon and teach Rakatans about technology and the Force.

events.title: First Migration
events.dialog: Eight Tho Yor Pyramidal ships pick up many Force-sensitive beings and gather around the Ninth ship on Tython to spark an immense Force Storm. On Tython, the Je`daii Order was formed to keep the balance of the Light and Dark Sides of the Force.

events.title: Star Forge Used
events.dialog: Star forge made over the star Abo in Lehon System used to expand to Unknown Regions and Western Galaxy

events.title: RIE Arrives on Kashyyyk
events.dialog: RIE installs terraforming computer on Kashyyyk  to manipulate Wroshyr trees

events.title: RIE Devolve Kwa
events.dialog: RIE devolve Kwa to Kwi lizards and bring rancors from Dathomir to Gamorr

events.title: Sith Drive off the Killiks
events.dialog: Sith Drive off the Killiks using revenge and hatred powers along with alchemy.

events.title: RIE Discover Korriban
events.dialog: RIE discover Korriban and introduce Sith to holocron technology and the Dark Side. King Adas drives them away and dies. The Sith expand to surrounding systems using RIE technology
